title: Spectre attacks
extract: Meltdown and Spectre exploit critical vulnerabilities in modern processors . These hardware vulnerabilities allow programs to steal data which is currently processed on the computer. ... Meltdown and Spectre work on personal computers, mobile devices, and in the cloud.
extract_html: Meltdown and Spectre exploit critical vulnerabilities in modern processors . These hardware vulnerabilities allow programs to steal data which is currently processed on the computer. ... Meltdown and Spectre work on personal computers, mobile devices, and in the cloud.
